job_history.work_description: Created critical KPIs to track and improve on-time delivery, customer issues and safety statistics. Lowered freight rates by 20% by negotiating with manufacturers and the transportation department. Increased the on-time deliveries by 30% within the first year of employment.

Reviewed new customer orders and requests and manually entered data into a centralized database. Conducted qualitative and quantitative analysis of logistics operations using simulation models and other tools. Negotiated contracts with outside providers to minimize costs to the company and customers.
Prepared invoices for all customers in the logistics department at the end of every month. Drafted reports every day to present accomplishments and progress to management.
